name: Marcus Reed
bio: Sports journalist and analytics writer covering pro football, basketball, and emerging sports tech. Known for breaking down complex stats into fan-friendly insights.

name: Jamal Carter
bio: Former college athlete turned sports analyst who specializes in game strategy, player development, and behind-the-scenes stories across major leagues.

name: Sophie Lang
bio: Sports lifestyle writer focusing on fan culture, stadium experiences, athlete branding, and the intersection of sports and social trends.

name: Claire Mitchell
bio: Data-driven sports analyst who uses advanced metrics to break down player performance, team efficiency, and predictive game modeling.

name: Antonio Ramirez
bio: Coverage specialist for international soccer and combat sports, bringing a global perspective on athletes, rivalries, and rising stars.

name: Hannah Ford
bio: Fitness and training contributor focusing on athlete conditioning, recovery techniques, and performance optimization.

name: Daniel Kovac
bio: Sports security and integrity writer covering issues such as anti-doping policies, fair play, and the technology safeguarding major sporting events.

name: Maya Chen
bio: Sports business and management analyst reporting on team operations, league economics, athlete marketing, and industry trends.

name: Elena Petrova
bio: In-depth analyst specializing in team strategy, defensive schemes, and long-form breakdowns of key matchups across multiple sports.

name: Tom Stevens
bio: Veteran sports writer known for storytelling, player interviews, and simplifying complex game concepts for casual and dedicated fans alike.
